tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
A year ago, my wife began experiencing mouth ulcers, which made it difficult for her to eat spicy food and enjoy meals. Despite consulting nearly seven doctors, her condition did not improve.
Thankfully, we were referred to Dr. Srinivas a month ago. He listened to her symptoms attentively and suggested conducting a biopsy. Within three days, the results confirmed that she had Oral Lichen Planus. Dr. Srinivas prescribed a course of medication, and to our surprise, within just 25 days, her condition had reduced by 70%. Now, after consistent treatment, her condition has improved by 95%, and she can enjoy spicy food once again.
We are immensely grateful to Dr. Srinivas for his exceptional care and expertise. His treatment has significantly improved my wife's quality of life, and we highly recommend him to anyone facing similar issues.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: As soon as TMJ disk displacement was diagnosed Doctor Srinivas started my treatment firstly by explaining in detail about how the disk should work normally and how my disk looks currently this gave us clear idea what was the reason for my jaw lock.  Within a month of treatment I was able to open my mouth wide and there was clear evident of progress. I'm still undergoing treatment however as per Doctor examination in follow up Visits my disk is almost in its normal position and I could feel my pain is reduced drastically and I'm able to move my jaw comfortably. I highly recommend Doctor Srinivas for treatment of TMJ related disorders.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. K. Srinivas sir is very good, friendly nature, explanation of health issue is neatly and treatment is  very good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I strongly recommend Dr. Srinivas as he is very friendly & patiently hears all queries, explains the root-cause,  diagnosis followed by treatment very clearly. I had to undergo inner cheek biopsy & there was absolutely 0-pain through out the procedure & am healing well.  All his staff members also very nice, always reachable (right from reception, assistants and dental nurses). Great experience!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I, strongly recommend the doctor for any dental related issue particularly Oral Lichen Planus.
 
I was suffering from Oral Lichen Planus for the last 3 years which became very acute and was finding very difficult to eat even less spicy foods and thought that I would suffer like this during my life time, until I visited Dr Srinivas about a month back.
 
Thankfully I was referred this Dr by my gynecologist during one of my visit.  I am so lucky and extremely happy to meet Dr K Srinivas who is very kind and listened to my sufferings and treated me for Oral Lichen Planus.  It is less than a month now I am taking treatment from him and I am highly grateful and indebted to him for treating me where I find more than 70% improvement and able to eat little spicy food. Before visiting him I had consulted other Doctors who advised and treated but not of much use.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent experience!! The doctor explained the problem clearly and advised the next steps as well.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr Srinivas for my treatment of Oral Lichen Planus. Prior to his consultation, I visited 3 other doctors. No one gave me a proper explanation as to what happening with me. I use to get painful blisters in my mouth and it was causing difficulty in eating. On my visit to a ENT specialist, who identified that I might be suffering from  Lichen Planus, she suggested me to visit this doctor as he was a specialist in it.

Dr Srinivas, on consultation, spoke to the point. He quickly diagnosed my case. He gave me a thorough review of the potential causes, treatments and prevention measures. He did an oral biopsy to verify the issue and it came out positive for Oral Lichen Planus.  He then suggested a medicine for it along  control measures and changes in dietary habits. Since then I have visible improvement with my case. I would definitely recommend it. Hoping to see more improvements with his help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been consulting Dr Srinivas for many years now. I have built a lot of trust on his ability to cure me and give me appropriate advice. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ******** ** *** ** *** **** ******** * **** **** I am terribly afraid of dentists.  But he is very sensitive to that and goes and extra mile to make me feel comfortable.  He is extremely professional and communicates with patients with clarity during every step of the procedures and ensures they are ok and don't go through pain or stress.  I had bleeding gums was diagnosed with Plasma Gingivitis.  He advised a line of treatment which showed visible differences in just a month's time. My gratitude üôè to doctor goes beyond stars! His staff too is considerate and caring. 
My sincere recommendation and reference to all is to visit Dr. Srinivas K at Sadguru's Facial & Dental Clinic

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
My father aged 72 has been having multiple chronic illnesses and had developed severe ulcers in the tongue. It might sound trivial but my father's food intake reduced significantly due to the ulcers to a point that he started losing weight. 

We had met 7 other doctors earlier over 2-3 months and none were able to diagnose or treat the ulcers. Hat tip to Dr.Srinivas for his willingness to listen thoroughly to the patient and taking detailed notes before even diving into the issue. It took him literally 2 minutes to diagnose that it was a fungal infection and prescribed medicines. In 2 weeks course, the ulcers disappeared. 

Thank you very much, doctor! You're a godsend. 

The clinic is spic and span. They follow all Covid-related precautions. The overall experience is a 10 on 10. Maybe 12 on 10!:)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Examinations,Dental Cleaning,Bleeding Gums Treatment,Oral Lesions Screening,
review: I've been seeing Dr. K Srinivas for all of my family's dental concerns and oral meds since 2011. He is one of Bangalore's best doctors. When you consult him and explain your situation, he will correctly identify the source of the problem. You will feel as if half of your problem has been solved simply by talking to him without the use of drugs. That is how he takes good care of his patient. He is reachable at any time and patiently explains everything to you. He is one of the rare doctors who is an expert in oral medicine. For any oral ailment, I strongly recommend Dr. K Srinivas.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had gums issue and visited my regular dentist. She referred me to Dr. K Srinivas immediately as she sensed something which needs professional and experienced attention. With fear, i visited Dr.K Srinivas.  But when I visited Dr. K Srinivas I understood why I was referred. He is a professional with lots of experience in this field. He is humble and simple. He clears all our doubts and explains things clearly. The clinic is not flashy but has a homely atmosphere. And his care is very much appreciable. He examined and explained my problem in detail and assured me of the solution. I followed the medication as advised by him and i am happy now. Thanks to Dr.K Srinivas sir.

review:
I have been very fortunate to know Dr. Srinivas and Dr. Pratima for a few years now. They have been taking care of the dental problems of all my family members. 
We have visited many dentists earlier but there was always doubt if we are in the right hands. But with Dr. Srinivas, you get a positive vibration and can rest assured. 
Dr. Srinivas is not only an extremely skilled dentist but a good human, who thinks from our perspective. He carefully listens to our concerns and responds appropriately without any doubt. The clinic is also very clean and well maintained. 
If you are looking for a reliable dentist, *** ** **** ************* *** ******** then you should visit the Sadguru clinic without a second thought.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had tried going to several dental surgeons and dental hospitals and never really got TMJ cured. Surgery was the last option I was considering. Luckily got contact of Dr. Srinivas. I received best of the suggestions, detailed explanation of my issue and a perfect fit splint. It's been more than 2 years, I have not faced pain at all. I had used splint for almost 10 months and followed doctor's suggestion post that. Recently, we have been consulting Dr. Srinivas for my father in law for another dental issue and we are satisfied with the treatment and attention Doctor has been providing to him.

Hats off for this excellent service at Sadguru dental clinic!!! This is an entire package, Excellent doctor n, excelkent treatment n excellent precautions taken for the safely of his patients. Thank you Dr Srinivas!!!
